item.title: Ascendance of a Bookworm - PrePub
item.description: /c/Ascendance of a Bookworm - PrePub on bookwormstory.social https://bookwormstory.social/c/aobprepub Description A Space for discussing the weekly chapter releases. Even though this is a separate community please be aware that Post titles and in some cases the first few lines of text will be displayed in the local and all feeds, so avoid spoilers there as much as possible anyway. Thanks. Details * Subscribers 14 Posts 1 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 1 Monthly Active Users 1 Published 2023-06-15 20:37:59 Updated 1969-12-31 19:00:00 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:22
